answerText: Po River[10] The Po River flows into this sea east of Italy, which separates the peninsula from the Balkans.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 7 | 5 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: This river encapsulates the Maira River and flows through Piacenza. For 10 points each: [10]  Name this longest river in Italy, which flows through Turinon on the way to its mouth, near Venice.
